name: Neon Pinball
description:
Pinball game old style. 80's are back.

You have 5 balls to join the switches on the top of the screen in order to access the boss screen. There in one minute and with the balls left you have you have to push up the boss to join it with the magenta field. 

Share your points with everybody in the high scores table.

Is fast, is crazy but at least is free. :p
